kDesc
The rallying cry of Rockstars and Red Dead Redemption fans alike; wear it with pride. [#Legal]
Fans de Rockstar et de Red Dead Redemption, unissez-vous en portant ce T-Shirt ! [#Legal]
Die Parole von Rockstars und Red-Dead-Redemption-Fans gleichermaßen; trage es mit Stolz. [#Legal]
Lo slogan dei fan di Rockstar e Red Dead Redemption. Indossala con orgoglio. [#Legal]
El grito de guerra de los fans de Rockstar y Red Dead Redemption; llévala con orgullo. [#Legal]

The rallying cry of Rockstars and Red Dead Redemption fans alike; wear it with pride. [#Legal]
